hadiths.text: Narrated `Aisha:Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) used to offer the Fajr prayer and some believing women covered with their veiling sheets used to attend the Fajr prayer with him and then they would return to their homes unrecognized

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي كَمْ تُصَلِّي الْمَرْأَةُ فِي الثِّيَابِ
chapter.eng-name: In how many (what sort of) clothes a woman should offer Salat (prayer)
